effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Barbed Shot at 100% effectiveness. Casting Bestial Wrath always hits a Jackpot!

Set: Hitting a Jackpot! infuses your pet with a mutagen, causing its auto-attacks to deal 15,761 Nature damage to its target and up to 5 enemies within 10 yds for 8 sec. Mutagenic attacks reduce the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 0.3 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a chance to harmonize with the shard, granting you 17,879 Agility for 15 sec.

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 373 Agility up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 93,491 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 140,244.
